QuestData.Title: Emptier Nests
QuestData.Description: Oh, thank goodness, another cloud serpent trainer!$B$BI just received word that the wild hatchlings at Windward Isle to the northeast are in serious trouble!$B$BWhile the adults fight those terrible saurok, who is watching the cute little babies? No one, that's who!$B$BWE HAVE TO SAVE THEM!$B$BI'm sending every trainer I can find to go and help. If you aren't too busy, can you make sure the hatchlings are safely delivered back to their mothers' nests?
QuestData.LogDescription: Leash and return 6 Windward Hatchlings to their nests.
